alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 4:00PM EST until December 24 at 5:49PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Grafton and Belknap Counties. For the Pemigewasset River...including Woodstock, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Plymouth. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water enters the parking lot behind the PSU ice arena. At 15.0 feet, Flood waters up to the road at the Irving station on route 175A in Holderness. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:31 PM EST Friday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 14.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
